meanings.sent1: The instructions were noncomplicated and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The noncomplicated puzzle was quickly solved by the children.
meanings.sent3: She appreciated the noncomplicated recipe that even beginners could master.
meanings.sent4: His noncomplicated approach to problem-solving saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The noncomplicated design of the toy made it perfect for young children.

meanings.definition: Easy to understand or deal with.
meanings.sent1: The noncomplicated explanation helped the students grasp the concept easily.
meanings.sent2: The noncomplicated task was completed in no time.
meanings.sent3: He found the noncomplicated riddle amusingly simple.
meanings.sent4: Her noncomplicated solution to the issue surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The noncomplicated language used in the book made it accessible to all readers.
